description: Detects PowerShell creating a PowerShell file (.ps1). While often times this behavior is benign, sometimes it can be a sign of a dropper script trying to achieve persistence.
author: frack113
false_positives: False positives will differ depending on the environement and scripts used. Apply additional filters accordingly.
name: PowerShell Script Dropped Via PowerShell.EXE
query: ((process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe") AND file.path.text:"*.ps1") AND (NOT ((file.path.text:"*__PSScriptPolicyTest_*") OR ((file.path.text:"C\:\\Users\\*" AND file.path.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*")) OR (file.path.text:"C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*"))))
